bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Etiological Agent. identical with han 寒① , cold . Shang han lun 傷寒論 380: 所以然者，胃中寒冷故也 , “This is so because of the presence of cold in the stomach”.

② Pathological Condition identical with han 寒② . Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 Substance Entry shu jiao 蜀椒：除六腑寒冷， 傷寒温瘧 , “It removes the cold from the six palaces, and [serves to cure] harm caused by cold, and warmth malaria”. ③ Illness Sign identical with han 寒③ . Xin xiu ben cao 新修本草 Substance Entry luan jing 欒荊：濕痹寒冷疼痛 , “Moisture-blockage with cold and pain”. ④ Pharmacological Quality identical with han 寒④ . Ben cao jing ji zhu 本草經集注 Substance Entry ji xue cao 積雪草：方藥亦不用， 想此草當寒冷爾 , “It is not made use of in pharmaceutical recipes because it is thought to be of a cold quality”.
